name: places/ChIJbwrAQP1YwokR5XEI5hSnpLQ

displayName.text: La Rukico Custom Suits NYC - Bespoke Tailors

formattedAddress: 152 E 48th St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 152 E 48th St, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: We entered this random tailor store yesterday after we had an emergency and needed to print some stuff and nothing else was open. However, it was one of the sweetest interactions ever. Mr. Kelly didn't have to help us and it was completely out of the scope of their services, but he still chose to help us.  Definitely going there if I need some relevant services from him. Interactions like that are what make the city special and I was glad I went in there. Recommend everyone to go if they need some fantastic tailoring services.

text.text: We entered this random tailor store yesterday after we had an emergency and needed to print some stuff and nothing else was open. However, it was one of the sweetest interactions ever. Mr. Kelly didn't have to help us and it was completely out of the scope of their services, but he still chose to help us.  Definitely going there if I need some relevant services from him. Interactions like that are what make the city special and I was glad I went in there. Recommend everyone to go if they need some fantastic tailoring services.

originalText.text: Mr. Kelly and his team did an amazing job making my  fiance's suit for our wedding. They are no non-sense and straight-forward in giving advise on what color, style and fit will look great on him. (They even have a tie specialist who knows what goes best for a suit color!) They use high quality and branded materials. The custom suit came out amazing and says a lot about their craftsmanship, given that we have a rush order of 2 weeks. They even managed to add personal touches on the suit to remember our big day! For anyone looking for a reliable, reasonable and high quality custom tailor in New York City, La Rukico is absolutely highly recommended. Thanks again Mr. Kelly for all your help and wish you more success!

originalText.text:
I’ve been visiting Mr. Kelley for quite a number of years.  Just ordered a tuxedo, sport jacket, slacks and shirts.  They were available sooner than promised and fit perfectly!

He was also able to provide great advice and suggestions.

I also brought in some clothes from 2 previous batches that are holding up amazingly well, but needed some alterations.  Mr. Kelley was happy to help me get those done so they’re back to fitting amazing again.

originalText.text: I'm extremely pleased with my custom suit from La Rukico. Mr. Kelly and his staff are experts and did an excellent job. I often find it difficult to find good fitting suits off the rack and decided to try bespoke with La Rukico. I couldn't be happier with the end product. Very high quality construction and fabrics at a very reasonable price. I would highly recommend.

text.text: I'm extremely pleased with my custom suit from La Rukico. Mr. Kelly and his staff are experts and did an excellent job. I often find it difficult to find good fitting suits off the rack and decided to try bespoke with La Rukico. I couldn't be happier with the end product. Very high quality construction and fabrics at a very reasonable price. I would highly recommend.

originalText.text:
La Rukico Custom Tailor has quite literally changed my life and I could not be happier. The quality and craftsmanship, the expert tailoring and overall experience are second to none. I have purchased suits, dress shirts, sports jackets, winter coats and have always been extremely pleased. I continually receive compliments from total strangers on how good my suits look which is always tremendously flattering and confidence building.

My last point is how tuned in Mr Kelley is with what you need. I no longer go to see him with a preconceived notion of what I want, I just say I need a new sports jacket and leave the rest to him. And his choices are always amazing. Go see him, you will never be disappointed.
